original: zhes so // nyi ma rgyas pa'i dus tshod la sbun pa spar do khyer nas dben pa'i sar bor la gtang ngo //
analyzed: zhes so // nyi ma rgyas pa'i dus tshod la sbun pa spar do khyer nas dben pa'i sar bor la gtang ngo //
translated: At the time of the full sun, take a handful of chaff and cast it into a secluded place.

original: zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi dus su 'dre mo 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi dus su 'dre mo 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: At the time of twenty-one days, the demoness will come.

original: de mi sdug pa'i gzugs ston na de la 'jigs par mi bya'o //
analyzed: de mi sdug pa'i gzugs ston na de la 'jigs par mi bya'o //
translated: If she shows an ugly form, do not be afraid of her.

original: sngags zlos shing de dang gtam smra'o //
analyzed: sngags zlos shing de dang gtam smra'o //
translated: Recite the mantra and speak with her.

original: de nas de na re bdag gis ci bgyi zhes zer na /

original: bdag la grub par gyis shig ces bya'o //

original: de nas gter ston pa dang / blo 'phel ba'i rdzas dang / gzhan yang 'dod pa thams cad ster ba dang / thams cad srung bar byed ba'i 'dre mo'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
analyzed: de nas gter ston pa dang / blo 'phel ba'i rdzas dang / gzhan yang 'dod pa thams cad ster ba dang / thams cad srung bar byed ba'i 'dre mo'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
translated: Then, the accomplishment of the treasure-revealer, the substances for increasing the intellect, and also the granting of all wishes and the protection of all is complete.
